patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell coffee and tea
We have coffee and tea
Our main products are various types of coffee and tea. We also offer pastries and light snacks.
We specialize in artisanal coffee and premium teas. Would you like to know about our daily specials?

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal
We accept various payment methods including VISA, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
Yes, we accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and mobile payment options. Cash is also welcome.

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days
Shipping takes 2-4 days
Standard delivery usually takes 2-4 business days. We also offer express shipping for an additional fee, which can deliver your items within 1-2 business days.
Delivery times vary depending on your location. Standard shipping is 2-4 days, while express options are available for faster delivery.
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? He was outstanding in his field!
What do you call a fake noodle? An impasta!
We are open Monday to Friday from 7 AM to 8 PM, and on weekends from 8 AM to 6 PM.
Our business hours are 7 AM - 8 PM on weekdays, and 8 AM - 6 PM on Saturdays and Sundays.
We're open every day! Weekdays 7-8, and weekends 8-6. Looking forward to serving you!

patterns: How can I find your store?
responses: Our main store is located at 123 Coffee Street, Beantown. We also have locations in Brewville and Espresso City.
You can find us at 123 Coffee Street in Beantown. We're right across from Central Park.
We have three locations: Beantown, Brewville, and Espresso City. Which one is most convenient for you?

patterns: Do you have a food menu?
responses: Our menu includes a variety of coffee drinks, teas, and pastries. Would you like me to list some options?
We offer espresso-based drinks, pour-overs, cold brews, and a selection of teas. We also have a range of pastries and light snacks.
Our specialties include our signature caramel latte, cold brew, and artisanal teas. We also have vegan and gluten-free options available.
Our most popular drinks are our house blend coffee, vanilla latte, and matcha green tea. Would you like to know more about any of these?

patterns: How do you prepare your coffee?
What brewing methods do you use?
Do you roast your own beans?
Where do your coffee beans come from?
responses: We use various brewing methods including espresso, pour-over, French press, and cold brew. Each method brings out unique flavors in the coffee.
Our coffee beans are ethically sourced and fair trade certified. We work directly with farmers to ensure quality and sustainability.
We roast our beans in small batches to ensure freshness and optimal flavor. Our roastery is actually visible from the cafe!
Our coffee beans come from various regions including Ethiopia, Colombia, and Sumatra. Each origin offers distinct flavor profiles.

patterns: Can I work from your cafe?
How do I connect to your internet?
responses: Yes, we offer free WiFi to all our customers. Just ask for the password when you make a purchase.
We have high-speed WiFi available. The password changes weekly, so please ask our staff for the current one.
Our cafe is laptop-friendly with plenty of outlets. Feel free to work or study here!
To connect to our WiFi, select 'CoffeeShop_Guest' and enter the password provided on your receipt.

patterns: Do you have open mic nights?
responses: We host various events including live music on Fridays, open mic nights on Wednesdays, and coffee tasting workshops monthly.
This weekend we have a latte art competition on Saturday and a jazz brunch on Sunday. Would you like more details?
We regularly organize coffee workshops, covering topics from brewing techniques to latte art. Check our events board for upcoming dates!
Our next big event is a meet-the-roaster session next Thursday. It's a great opportunity to learn about coffee sourcing and roasting!

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
What are the benefits of your membership?
How do I sign up for rewards?
responses: Yes, we have a loyalty program! You earn 1 point for every dollar spent, and 50 points get you a free drink.
Our rewards program offers exclusive discounts, early access to new products, and a free birthday drink. You can sign up at the counter.
Members of our loyalty program get a 10% discount every Monday and double points on weekends. It's free to join!
To sign up for our rewards program, just download our app or ask for a physical card at the counter. Start earning points with your very first purchase!
